name: Conquist Tournament
description:
The epic struggle for world domination
-> Join more than 50.000 iOS and Mac players <- 

Conquist Tournament takes the classic turn based strategy game to a whole new level:

- Realtime worldwide online multiplayer with smart matchmaking.
- Power Cards with new strategic moves: nuclear attacks, aerial attacks, espionage and much more.
- In-match diplomacy that allows you to communicate with other players.
- Two game modes: secret mission and world domination.
- Custom leaderboard system based on the ELO algorithm (as used in chess championships).
- New tournaments and leagues starting every two weeks.
- Win trophies, skill and career badges; show them off at the Hall Of Fame.

The successor of the universally acclaimed game Conquist 2 (4.5 stars, top paid in many countries, featured by Apple numerous times), Conquist Tournament delivers an unmatched online experience for board and strategy game lovers.

This game is also available for your Mac: https://itunes.apple.com/app/conquist-tournament/id722946777
